verbal.translation[0].definitions[1].def: relating to words or using words
verbal.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: verbal abuse  (=cruel words) from other kids on the street
verbal.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a word that has been formed from a verb, for example a gerund, infinitive, or participle
verbal.translation[1].definitions[1].def: relating to criticism, complaints, or an attack that you express in speech
verbal.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: Maria was getting loads of verbal from her staff.
verbal.translation[2].definitions[0].def: a verbal contract, agreement etc is one that is spoken rather than written
verbal.translation[2].definitions[0].exa: The bank manager gaveverbal assurances of the security of the investments.
